sentences.en: Come weal, come woe , we care na by.
sentences.cn: 不管来的是福是祸, 我们都不在乎.

sentences.en: Computer ownership and access are highly stratified along lines of weal th, race, education, and geography.
sentences.cn: 拥有计算机和获得上网机会的情况,按财产 、 种族教育和地域的不同 、 差别很大.

sentences.en: For weal or woe we are now involved in the fortunes of the Carson family.
sentences.cn: 无论是祸是福,我们现在和卡森一家的命运紧紧联系在一起了.

sentences.en: He was faithful to me in weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 不管是在顺境或是在逆境,他一直对我忠诚.

sentences.en: He was not only and amiable, but also weal and woe with the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他不仅待人和气, 还能和士兵同甘共苦.

sentences.en: Joe and Mary are a couple who share weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 乔治和玛丽是一对患难夫妻.

sentences.en: Love is sharing weal and woe.

sentences.cn: 福兮祸所伏,祸兮福所倚.

sentences.en: Our two peoples are brothers sharing weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 我们两国人民是患难与共的兄弟.

sentences.en: The only remains, i also hear their songs at the midnight the weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 唯一不变的,是仍旧在午夜放起他们的歌,一首一首, 纠结得百转千回.

sentences.en: They are ordinary labourers, sharing weal and woe with the people.
sentences.cn: 他们是和人民群众同甘共苦的普通劳动者.

sentences.en: They maintain the closest relations with the masses and share their weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 他们和群众血肉相连,休戚与共.

sentences.en: We are brothers sharing weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 我们是患难与共的兄弟.

trans.tran_en: prosperity or wellbeing (now esp in the phrases the public weal, the common weal)
